section:
Référence de la classe BinaryUtils BinaryUtils Graphe de collaboration de BinaryUtils:
Fonctions membres publiques statiques
static applyVariant (int $clockSeq)
static applyVersion (int $timeHi, int $version)
Description détaillée
Provides binary math utilities
Documentation des fonctions membres
applyVariant() applyVariantBinaryUtils BinaryUtilsapplyVariant
static applyVariant (int $clockSeq)[static]
Applies the RFC 4122 variant field to the 16-bit clock sequence
RFC 4122, § 4.1.1: Variant int $clockSeq The 16-bit clock sequence value before the RFC 4122 variant is applied int The 16-bit clock sequence multiplexed with the UUID variant -pure
applyVersion() applyVersionBinaryUtils BinaryUtilsapplyVersion
static applyVersion (int $timeHi, int $version)[static]
Applies the RFC 4122 version number to the 16-bit time_hi_and_version field
RFC 4122, § 4.1.3: Version int $timeHi The value of the 16-bit time_hi_and_version field before the RFC 4122 version is applied int $version The RFC 4122 version to apply to the time_hi field int The 16-bit time_hi field of the timestamp multiplexed with the UUID version number -pure
La documentation de cette classe a été générée à partir du fichier suivant : public/glpi/vendor/ramsey/uuid/src/BinaryUtils.php
